item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

While making a pimptastic command, I get this error

client.java:11472: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

WTF IS A ILLEGAL START OF EXPRESSION?
anyways… this is what it looks like in my client.java

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount);{ if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){ if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) { bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); [br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 08:42:11 PM

Read full topic
